title: Против течения
overview: Two friends - stuntman Sergei and businessman Oleg - started a big movie. But already at the beginning of filming, a misfortune happened: Sergei's wife died while performing a stunt. To distract his friend from difficult thoughts, Oleg sends him and American producer Martin to look for beautiful places for location filming. One day they are attacked by an unknown person. The American is killed, Sergei miraculously manages to survive, and he, wounded, is picked up by the hunter Anatoly. All evidence points to Sergei's guilt...
